description.value: Your calloused hands and red eyes speak to a life spent in the deep darkness of mountain caverns, where you learned to battle on rocky cliffs and survive with minimal resources. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Terrain Expertise (Underground)]{Terrain Expertise (Underground)} skill feat and the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Combat Climber]{Combat Climber} skill feat.
